attributes.action: Stop non-stun slaughter as it causes suffering  to the animals.
attributes.additional_details:
This goes against my Christian values as it states in the bible not to eat foods sacrificed to idols.
Halal meats are sacrificed to Allah through prayer.
attributes.background: The government made law for non-stun slaughter for religious purposes. This law is being flaunted by the sale of religiously slaughtered meats to the general public through supermarkets etc.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300257.
